import React from "react" import OnlineCourses from "./OnlineCourses" import "../allcourses/courses.css" import { coursesCard } from "../../dummydata" const HAbout = () => { return ( <>
'our courses' title='explore our popular online courses' />
{/* copy code form coursesCard */}
{coursesCard.slice(0, 3).map((val) => (

{val.coursesName}

{val.courTeacher.map((details) => ( <>

{details.name}

{details.totalTime} ))}

{val.priceAll} / {val.pricePer}

))}
) } export default HAbout;
